channel.title: Writing on Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Perfect Dark Mode

item.title: Writing Off the Cuff
item.description: My favorite and by far easiest method of writing is writing off the cuff. You get your thoughts down and spring new thoughts to life. You are finding out what you know without referencing materials. You are creating out of nothing. It is pure writing and creativity folded into one. We all have a “Muse” that will give to us whenever we ask. All you have to do is start writing.
